title: 2 BR Jamaica Plain - No Fee - Separate Laundry
map_address: Dresden Street near Spring Park Ave
posting_body: Two Bedroom apartment with lots of charm.
Located just a 2 minute walk to the Stony Brook T stop.
Get your morning coffee on the way at "City Feed and Supply" neighborhood coffee and grocery store.
1st floor apartment in a Victorian style 2 family house with two bedrooms, one bath, living room and eat-in kitchen.
Kitchen has outside deck with private patio area ready for grill and patio furniture.
New washer and dryer in basement.
Private front entrance.
Central A/C system.
Pets and smoking are not allowed.
This is a NO FEE LISTING.
Required on Move-In: 1st, last and Security.
Credit, background checks and prior landlord references required during application process.
1st, Last months and Security due on lease signing.
If you are interested in scheduling an apartment showing, please include the information requested below in your request for tour.
PLEASE NOTE: Request to schedule tours without all the information noted below will not be responded to.
***See requested information below***
Occupant Name (s):
Current Town and State:
Move-date:
Credit score (s):
Annual employment Income (s):
Job Title(s):
Pets:
Smoker:
# of Occupants:
# of Vehicles:
Please Note: False and/or misleading information in communications during request for showing is grounds for denying schedule viewings and application processing.
Amenities: Smoke and Pet Free unit, Central AC, Back Porch with private outdoor patio, New Laundry.
